text: Ara tomara palanakarta yakhana pheresatadigake balalenah ami prthibite ekajana pratinidhi banate yacchi, takhana pheresatagana balala, tumi ki prthibite emana ka'uke srsti karabe ye danga-hangamara srsti karabe ebam raktapata ghatabe? Athaca amara niyata tomara gunakirtana karachi ebam tomara pabitra sattake smarana karachi. Tini balalena, nihsandehe ami jani, ya tomara jana na.
